query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(date_of_death) AS month, sum(new_deaths) AS total_new_deaths, count(*) AS count_entries WHERE date_of_death >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

column_metadata.description: Count of deaths on specified date
Cumulative deaths as of specified date

table_metadata.title: COVID-19 Deaths Over Time
table_metadata.description: This dataset represents San Francisco COVID-19 related deaths by day, with updates on the data as more information becomes available.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Public health officials, researchers, policy makers, and the general public
